post.body: If Fox really wants some goodwill, they'll shoot the actual film canisters of THE DAY THE EARTH STOOD STILL into deep space.
@kenlowery Oh, you mean the comic book. For a second I thought you were hating on Jarmusch's Stranger THAN Paradise.
You get any snow in Dallas? There are still tiny patches of snow on the ground this morning in Austin. So crazy.
Again, not a lie.
Those weren't lies and you know it.
I definitely feel slighted. And I enjoyed this week's show quite a lot. Fooey on them!
That's how I always watch it. No wonder you don't like it.
@theisb I like the Big Bang Theory. You big meanies.
Two words: Mutant gophers. Let's brainstorm.
has once again made me aware of an (Amazon) offer I can't refuse: ELECTRIC LADYLAND for $1.99.
Lawyered!
Got an acquaintance who watches that show regularly, swears it's all real. He also believes the Moon Landing was faked.
See, now I'm jealous.
Sheepishly? Proudly! Let's see what happens after that daiquiri!
keeps talking about "Major Nelson." If he's not referring to Larry Hagman in I DREAM OF JEANNIE, I will be very disappointed.
How are the I's?
My statement speaks for itself.
You act as though you didn't already know POISON IVY III was the finest role of Jaime Pressly's career. And I know that ain't true.
I own THE GUN SELLER. It's very much like Elmore Leonard meets P.G. Wodehouse. I recommend it, but not tremendously highly.
I vote Dirty Dozen.
HA! I've been watching that! "Don't disturb my friend, he's dead tired."
Yay hooray! Now I'm about to quit.
Kind of like how learning to love yourself is the greatest love of all.
Dang, you're the only Twitterer left keeping me company. Good night. I'll be up another couple hours at least.
Son of a biscuit, I never knew that! Very cool.
@kenlowery Smashing Pumpkins, "Zero."
Tom's 4th Annual Musical Ignorance List, inspired by the AV Club's Best Music of 2008. http://tinyurl.com/5qncrz
Update on my very slow INFINITE JEST progress: page 567, footnote 235.
I'll just be sitting here in the dark, all alone. Going blind.
Don't feel obligated to read it or anything, even though it's a painstaking, time-consuming labor of love.
Oh, hey, I guess I might as well pimp my latest GrimJack post. I make so few posts lately, each one is an event. http://tinyurl.com/5p24vc
The colder it gets, the longer it takes my dog to poop. Stupid dog. WHY WON'T YOU POOP MORE QUICKLY WHEN I AM YELLING AT YOU
DUDE IT SNOWED IN AUSTIN TONIGHT I THREW A SNOWBALL IN FREAKING AUSTIN OH MY GOD SO AWESOME
I'm going to go watch this week's TiVoed episode of The Big Bang Theory now. So there.
Going to fancy Christmas party tonight. I get to wear my Grinch tie for the first time this season. Hooray! Also, open bar. Double hooray!
Here is a thing that I'm doing Thursday night: going to see Jim Gaffigan at the Paramount. Meet & greet afterward. Jealous? You're jealous.
GrimJack hates bunnies.
Currently blasting Hendrix's "All Along the Watchtower." Now THAT'S the way to start your day!
I posted about my 20 favorite actresses, and it has a picture it took me a really long time to make, so go look. http://tinyurl.com/6zz2fk
Actual track on Britney Spears' new album: "If U Seek Amy." Translation: "F-U-C-K Me."
Golden Globe nominees were announced? Thanks for providing today's blog post! I suspect they're going to make me very angry, re: THE SHIELD.
So cold in my house I can see my breath. Might actually have to pay to fix the damn heater.
Time for me to exit, Terminator X-it.
I stand by my assertion that Joni Mitchell's "River" is perhaps the most beautiful a human voice has ever sounded.
Watched BIG for the first time in a long while this week. Elizabeth Perkins is totally a child molester in that movie.
In case you all were wondering: the White Russian was excellent. Sadly, I am now out of vodka. Do Kahlua and Mountain Dew mix?
I am now going to make myself a White Russian and there is literally nothing in the world any of you can do to stop me.
Downloaded Gaslight Anthem's "The '59 Sound," mostly on @NoelMu's recommendation. It is thoroughly kick-ass. Yay, I still like new music!
Warm enough yesterday to open back door and let in breeze. Then at bedtime, FORGOT TO CLOSE DOOR. Whole house is cold as hell, again.
Seriously, that Iraqi dude throwing shoes at Bush is #1 on my Top Ten List of BEST THINGS EVER. #2: Robocop. #3: Sex. #4: More sex.
Eating lunch at Texadelphia today when I saw video of Iraqi throwing shoes at Dubya. I think I scared other customers with my wild cheering.
Consequence of staying out all night and getting really drunk: woke up on couch at 6:30 AM, TV blaring, dog sleeping on top of me.
Saw the Gourds at Antone's last night. For free. Because I have connections. Seriously, I do.Yes, it was awesome. And by extension, so am I.
Top Ten Things Tom Was Underinformed About In 2008: Books, Comics, Movies, Music, Politics, Fashion, Art, Video Games, Theater, Technology.
Basically, I've got a Top Ten TV List in the works.
Comics, music, books, and maybe even movies.
It's Top Ten List time, and here are things I have not experienced enough of this year to make an informed Top Ten List:
Apparently the person I've been calling Audrina Partridge is actually Audrina PATRIDGE. No 1st R. Either way, I resent knowing who she is.
Yay, I'm not freezing in my own house this morning! That's progress.
Tom's blog mystery of the day: posting a naked Bettie Page resulted in no comments and no increased traffic. Up is down. Hell, I give up.
If I hear that dogs barking "JIngle Bells" song ONE MORE TIME during this holiday season, I will murder someone. I am not bluffing.
Update on house temperature, resulting from malfunctioning heater: colder than a witch's tit doing push-ups in the snow.
Refrained from drinking Jack Daniels tonight. In unrelated news: drank a lot of Jameson tonight. Yum!
Made nachos from scratch tonight. And by "from scratch" I mean "made corn chips out of corn tortillas," and went on from there.
Before 9 AM here, and I am about to head out to finally do my Christmas shopping. This could be a very ugly day. Wish me luck!
Watching SHAUN OF THE DEAD on Comedy Central. Funny how I watch it EVERY TIME on Comedy Central, but can't be bothered to watch my own DVD.
It's comin' on Christmas, they're cuttin' down trees
Some get stoned, some get strange, sooner or later it all gets real
Del the Funkee Homosapien, "Mistadobalina."
I guess I am not yet done with the random lyrics.
GLORY HALLE-STUPID
Mr. Dobalina Mr. Bob Dobalina Mr. Dobalina Mr. Bob Dobalina Mr. Dobalina Mr. Bob Dobalina Mr. Mr. Dobalina Mr. Bob Dobalina
Okay, I think I've got enough for two more mix CDs for my sister. No more random lyrics for tonight. You're welcome.
I put a bullet in his sugar head, he thanked me kindly then he lay down dead.
Doin' that stuff that you do, messin' me up with your voodoo.
Big hands, I know you're the one.
Emptiness is loneliness and loneliness is cleanliness and cleanliness is godliness and god is empty, just like me.
Me, I'm drinkin' beer at noon on Tuesday.
I want something good to die for to make it beautiful to live.
